translation.en: [boy] Dear Evan Hansen...
translation.fr: Cher Evan Hansen,

translation.en: Today is going to be an amazing day, and here's why.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, ça va être une super journée, et voici pourquoi :

translation.en: Because today, all you have to do is just be yourself.
translation.fr: parce qu'aujourd'hui, tu n'as qu'une chose à faire, être toi-même !

translation.en: But also confident. That's important.
translation.fr: Mais aussi confiant, c'est important,

translation.en: And interesting, easy to talk to, approachable,
translation.fr: intéressant, d'un abord facile, accessible.

translation.en: but mostly just be yourself.
translation.fr: Mais sois toi-même, avant tout,

translation.en: That's number one. Be yourself.

translation.en: But, like, a confident version of yourself,

translation.en: like, approachable and interesting,
translation.fr: d'un abord facile, intéressant,

translation.en: not weird or anxious or depressed, which you're not.

translation.en: I don't know why you're bringing it up.

translation.en: You can't be scared to talk to other people.
translation.fr: N'aie pas peur de parler aux autres.

translation.en: This year'd be different.

translation.en: You're overthinking it. Do you like having no friends?

translation.en: All you have to do is just be yourself.
translation.fr: Sois toi-même, point.

translation.en: [boy] Evan.
translation.fr: Evan…

translation.en: What?
translation.fr: Quoi ? C'est Zoe Murphy, avec son beau t-shirt,

translation.en: It's Zoe Murphy in that hot band shirt you love so much.
translation.fr: C'est Zoe Murphy, avec son beau t-shirt, qui te plaît tant.

translation.en: Can you just-- Can you please stop?
translation.fr: Tu peux arrêter ?

translation.en: Well, hey, maybe she's into you too.
translation.fr: Tu lui plais peut-être aussi,

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to her, tell her how you feel.
translation.fr: tu devrais lui parler. J'ai essayé.

translation.en: I've tried talking to her.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé.

translation.en: Really?
translation.fr: Ah bon ?

translation.en: I stayed afterwards last year, after the spring jazz band concert,
translation.fr: J'étais resté à la fin du concert de printemps,

translation.en: but, um, I didn't go up to her because I was worried that my hands were sweaty.
translation.fr: mais j'avais peur d'avoir les mains moites, alors qu'elles l'étaient pas tant que ça,

translation.en: Which they weren't even that sweaty. I just--
translation.fr: alors qu'elles l'étaient pas tant que ça,

translation.en: I was worried they were sweaty and worrying makes them sweaty.
translation.fr: mais la simple peur peut les rendre moites.

translation.en: So I just went to the bathroom and I put 'em under the hand dryer thing,
translation.fr: Alors je suis allé les passer sous le séchoir,

translation.en: but then they were still sweaty. They were just-- They were just also warm.
translation.fr: mais elles étaient encore moites, et chaudes.

translation.en: I was kidding.
translation.fr: Je plaisantais.

translation.en: You obviously should not talk to her. You are a literal disaster.
translation.fr: Ne va pas lui parler, tu es une catastrophe ambulante.

translation.en: Go, Bobcats!
translation.fr: Allez les Bobcats !

translation.en: Go, Bobcats.
translation.fr: Allez les Bobcats, vous êtes géniaux.

translation.en: So awesome. So awesome, everyone. Phenomenal, really.
translation.fr: Allez les Bobcats, vous êtes géniaux. Carrément géniaux, phénoménaux.

translation.en: You know what's not phenomenal? Deforestation.
translation.fr: Vous savez ce qui l'est moins ? La déforestation.

translation.en: -[laughter] -So, what happened to your arm, exactly?
translation.fr: Tu t'es fait quoi au bras ?

translation.en: I was climbing a tree and I fell. It was stupid.
translation.fr: En grimpant à un arbre, je suis tombé.

translation.en: You fell out of a tree? What are you, five?
translation.fr: T'es tombé d'un arbre ? T'as 5 ans ?

translation.en: So, actually, I worked this summer
translation.fr: J'ai été apprenti garde forestier cet été,

translation.en: as an apprentice park ranger at Ellison State Park.
translation.fr: J'ai été apprenti garde forestier cet été, à Ellison Park.

translation.en: It's a funny story though, because…
translation.fr: Anecdote amusante,

translation.en: there was ten minutes, after I fell,
translation.fr: je suis resté 10 bonnes minutes allongé par terre,

translation.en: where I just lay there on the ground, waiting for someone to come get me.
translation.fr: je suis resté 10 bonnes minutes allongé par terre, à attendre qu'on me ramasse.

translation.en: I was like, "Any second now." You know? I was saying to myself, "Any second now. Here they come." So…
translation.fr: Je me disais : "D'une seconde à l'autre, quelqu'un va venir."

translation.en: Did they?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un est venu ?

translation.en: No. Nobody came. That's the, um-- That's what's funny.
translation.fr: Non, personne, c'est ça qui est… amusant.

translation.en: That's not funny.
translation.fr: Pas du tout.

translation.en: Model UN.
translation.fr: Le club ONU…

translation.en: Well, anyways, um… How was-- Did you… How was camp?
translation.fr: Enfin bref, et toi, alors… ta colo ?

translation.en: Well, I put on 13 pounds of pure muscle.
translation.fr: J'ai pris 6 kilos de muscle,

translation.en: Also, I hooked up with this Brazilian dude who is literally a supermodel.
translation.fr: et j'ai fricoté avec un Brésilien qui est top-model dans la vie.

translation.en: So, yeah, hope that answers your question.
translation.fr: Ça répond à ta question ?

translation.en: So let's have Mother Nature's back so that she'll have ours.
translation.fr: Protégeons Mère Nature, pour qu'elle nous protège en retour.

translation.en: All right, thank you, Alana. Very inspirational.
translation.fr: Merci, Alana, pour ce discours motivant.

translation.en: All right, so, let's have a great year, and… Go, Bobcats!
translation.fr: Excellente année scolaire à tous, et allez les Bobcats !

translation.en: would you wanna sign my cast? You could-- You could be the first.
translation.fr: Tu voudrais signer mon plâtre ? Tu serais le premier.

translation.en: Why would I do that?
translation.fr: Pour quoi faire ?

translation.en: Well, I just-- I thought because we're friends, and…
translation.fr: Je me disais, comme on est amis…

translation.en: We're family friends, Evan. That's an entirely different thing.
translation.fr: Nos familles sont amies, ça n'a rien à voir.

translation.en: Please respect that.

translation.en: -You're such an idiot. -That is so not a joke.
translation.fr: T'es trop con !

translation.en: You think that's funny?

translation.en: What? No. Not at all.

translation.en: [shouting] Then stop laughing!

translation.en: Evan…

translation.fr: Oui, pardon, c'est bien Evan, pardon.

translation.en: Why are you sorry?
translation.fr: Pourquoi pardon ?

translation.en: 'Cause you said Evan, and then I said it, you know? I just repeated it, which is, um…
translation.fr: Parce que tu as dit Evan, et je n'ai fait que le répéter,

translation.en: That's just really annoying when people do that, so…
translation.fr: c'est énervant quand les gens font ça.

translation.en: I'm Zoe.
translation.fr: Moi, c'est Zoe.

translation.en: It's a-- I should-- I think-- Sorry.
translation.fr: Il faut que je… Pardon.

translation.en: [Evan] Dear Evan Hansen,
translation.fr: Cher Evan Hansen,

translation.en: Turns out this wasn't an amazing day after all.
translation.fr: En fait, cette journée n'était pas super du tout.

translation.en: This isn't gonna be an amazing week or an amazing year, because why would it be?
translation.fr: Ça ne va pas être une super semaine ni année, pourquoi ça le serait ?

translation.en: Oh, I know. Because there's Zoe.
translation.fr: Ah si, parce qu'il y a Zoe,

translation.en: Who I don't even know, and who doesn't know me, but…
translation.fr: que je ne connais même pas, et qui ne me connaît pas, mais…

translation.en: maybe if I did, maybe if I could just talk to her.
translation.fr: si je pouvais lui parler,

translation.en: Maybe things would be better.
translation.fr: peut-être que tout irait mieux.

translation.en: Or…
translation.fr: Ou alors…

translation.en: maybe nothing would be different at all.
translation.fr: ça ne changerait rien du tout.

translation.en: I wish everything was different.
translation.fr: Je voudrais que tout soit différent,

translation.en: I wish I was different.
translation.fr: je voudrais être différent,

translation.en: I wish I was part of something.
translation.fr: trouver ma place,

translation.en: I wish that anything I said mattered to anyone.
translation.fr: je voudrais que ce que je dis compte pour quelqu'un.

translation.en: But it doesn't, and it never did…
translation.fr: Mais ce n'est pas le cas, ça ne l'a jamais été,

translation.en: and it never will.
translation.fr: ça ne le sera jamais.

translation.en: I mean, face it, would anyone even notice if I just disappeared tomorrow?
translation.fr: Franchement, est-ce que quelqu'un remarquerait si je disparaissais ?

translation.en: Sincerely, your best and most dearest friend, me.
translation.fr: Bien à toi, ton meilleur et plus cher ami, Moi.

translation.en: Hey. What happened to your arm?
translation.fr: T'as quoi, au bras ?

translation.en: I was climbing a tree and I fell.
translation.fr: J'ai voulu grimper à un arbre.

translation.en: You fell out of a tree?
translation.fr: T'es tombé d'un arbre ?

translation.en: That's the saddest thing I've ever heard.
translation.fr: J'ai jamais rien entendu d'aussi triste.

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: So-- Sorry, um, I think I accidentally printed something.

translation.en: Yeah, we're all waiting.

translation.en: Um, no one signed your cast.
translation.fr: Ton plâtre est pas signé.

translation.en: -No, I know. -I'll sign it.
translation.fr: - Non, je sais. - Moi, je veux bien.

translation.en: -You don't-- You really don't have to-- -Do you have a Sharpie or…
translation.fr: T'es pas obligé. T'as un feutre ?

translation.en: I don't. Shoot.
translation.fr: Non, dommage.

translation.en: Here's one.
translation.fr: Il y en a un là.

translation.en: Nice.
translation.fr: Super.

translation.en: Wow, that's great.
translation.fr: C'est génial.

translation.en: Now we can both pretend we have friends.
translation.fr: Comme ça, on peut faire croire qu'on a des amis.

translation.en: -"Dear Evan Hansen." Here you go. -Yeah, that's mine.
translation.fr: "Cher Evan Hansen" ? Tiens. Oui, c'est à moi. Je la prends, pardon.

translation.en: That's mine. I can take it. Sorry.
translation.fr: Oui, c'est à moi. Je la prends, pardon.

translation.en: "Because there's Zoe"…
translation.fr: "Parce qu'il y a Zoe…"

translation.en: Is this about my sister?
translation.fr: Ça parle de ma sœur ?

translation.en: What? No, no. Who's-- Who's your sister?
translation.fr: Quoi ? Non, c'est qui, ta sœur ?

translation.en: -You wanted me to find this? -What?
translation.fr: Tu voulais que je tombe dessus ?

translation.en: You saw I was here, so you started writing this,
translation.fr: T'as vu que j'étais là, donc t'as écrit ça

translation.en: -and you started talking to me. -No, you started talking to me.
translation.fr: et tu m'as abordé… Non, c'est toi.

translation.en: So that I would read some creepy shit about my sister and freak out, right?

translation.en: -Why would I do that? -So you can tell everyone that I'm crazy.

translation.en: Gentlemen! Shh.

translation.en: No, I really--
translation.fr: Je dois…

translation.en: So-- Look, can you please just give it back?

translation.en: Just please don't show it to anyone.

translation.en: Connor!
translation.fr: Connor !

translation.en: Come on.
translation.fr: Allez !

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi, honey, I'm so sorry.
translation.fr: Mon chéri, excuse-moi.

translation.en: Erica called in at the last minute with a stomach bug, and there's only one other nurse on tonight.
translation.fr: Erica a une gastro, donc il manquait une infirmière ce soir.

translation.en: So I volunteered to take her shift.
translation.fr: J'ai proposé de la remplacer.

translation.en: I hope you weren't waiting for me to eat.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'attendais pas pour dîner ?

translation.en: -No, I already ate. -Um, it's just,
translation.fr: Non, j'ai mangé.

translation.en: they announced more budget cuts this morning, so anything I can do to show that I'm a team player, you know?
translation.fr: Vu les restrictions budgétaires, j'essaie de montrer mon esprit d'équipe.

translation.en: -How was your day? -Fine.
translation.fr: Et toi, ta journée ?

translation.en: It was-- It was pretty good.
translation.fr: Ça a été.

translation.en: Yeah? You know, I texted with Meera this morning, and she said Jared was really looking forward to
translation.fr: Meera m'a écrit ce matin que Jared avait hâte de te voir,

translation.en: seeing you and reconnecting. I thought that was nice.
translation.fr: de te retrouver, j'ai trouvé ça gentil.

translation.en: Yeah, he's so nice.
translation.fr: Oui, il est trop gentil.

translation.en: -How was Dr. Sherman? -Pretty good.
translation.fr: - Et avec le psy ? - Ça a été.

translation.en: Any change to your meds?
translation.fr: Il t'a changé de traitement ?

translation.en: Um, no.
translation.fr: Non.

translation.en: Oh, God. Here he comes. All right, I--
translation.fr: Mince, voilà le chef. Je te laisse.

translation.en: All right, love you. Bye.
translation.fr: Je t'aime fort, bisous !

translation.en: -Okay, I love you… -[line beeping]

translation.en: ...too.
translation.fr: aussi.

translation.fr: Une lettre à toi-même ?

translation.en: What is that, like some kind of sex thing?

translation.en: No. No, it's not a sex thing.

translation.en: -It was an assignment from my therapist. -Ew.

translation.en: I didn't know who to tell. You're my only… family friend.
translation.fr: À qui je le dirais ? Tu es mon seul… ami de famille.

translation.en: That's sad.
